title: Modern Apartments with A/C and a plethora of natural light
posting_body: The Wave takes modern design to new heights.
This 26 story apartment tower has an unparalleled look, location and breathtaking views (from up here you can see the 12th Person!).
The Wave is part of Stadium Place, a modern community designed so you can live, work and play in Seattle’s most famous neighborhoods.

The Wave luxury apartment homes offer floor to ceiling windows, top end finishes, quartz counters, air conditioning, walk in closets and wood flooring along with two roof top lounges with stunning views, a massive courtyard, high tech theater and a spa like fitness center.
Expansive Rooftop Deck with Views of Mount Rainier, Puget Sound, and Downtown Seattle
Onsite Controlled Access Parking and Storage
